title: NYE BROOKLYN BALL 2016
desc: NYE Brooklyn Ball with Brooklyn Borough President Eric Adams, introduces one of the most anticipated events, The Inaugural New Years Eve Brooklyn Ball celebration.?  ? Thousands of patrons will enjoy special performances throughout the day by legendary artist while witnessing the first NYE Brooklyn Ball rise into the sky.?  ? This event will be one that forever changes the face of Brooklyn's New Years Eve for years to come.
